text: Generally quiet place but a hostel where young people stay can get a bit messy and untidy along the corridors with shoes, clothes, odd and ends hanging around.
Good accomodation. However, it might be noisy at night due to your neighbors. This is due to the fact that Hall 12 is known to be a social hall.
Front office staff was very helpful.  I had a "pet-iguana" problem and they were able to spray to eliminate it.  Rooms have AC units.  Downside- no elevator.
Great stay and location! Only complain is the canteen here isn't as good as other halls so usually will have to go to neighbouring hall canteens to get my meal fix
It is the hall from the 12 to 15 series that is closest to the academic buildings. Super good if you study at the North Spine or NIE. The rooms are almost 20 years old though.
